original: Paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo cittavippayuttoti?
paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo cittasampayuttoti?
ñāṇaṁ saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannaṁ cittavippayuttaṁ, paññā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā cittasampayuttāti?
Vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho ekadeso cittasampayutto ekadeso cittavippayuttoti?
